long_description: With an automatic open feature the REI Jumbo 54 umbrella is ready to take on wet and windy weather with the simple push of a buttton. Push it again, and the umbrella is ready to fold away. Lightweight polyester canopy provides tough protection without bulkiness; 54 in. arc offers ample coverage. Vented canopy is engineered to resist extremely windy conditions. Reliable push button open/close mechanism responds quickly. Steel-shaft-and-rib construction stands up to strong winds and increases the durability of the umbrella; 3-section telescoping shaft. EVA cushioned handle is comfortable and easy to grip in wet weather. Includes carrying strap and umbrella sleeve/carrying case with carabiner clip.
short_description: With an automatic open feature the REI Jumbo 54 umbrella is ready to take on wet and windy weather with the simple push of a buttton. Push it again, and the umbrella is ready to fold away.
